Method.name: UpdateSSLSuperServer
Method.Implementation:
set p("CertificateFile")="c:\Certificados\cert.pem" set p("Ciphersuites")="TLS_AES_256_GCM_SHA384:TLS_CHACHA20_POLY1305_SHA256:TLS_AES_128_GCM_SHA256" set p("Description")="Autogenerated SuperServer Configuration" set p("Enabled")=1 set p("PrivateKeyFile")="c:\Certificados\key.pem" // set p("PrivateKeyPassword")="" set p("PrivateKeyType")=2 set p("TLSMaxVersion")=32 set p("TLSMinVersion")=16 // Set TLSMinVersion to 32 to stick with TLSv1.3 set p("Type")=1 set sc = ##class(Security.SSLConfigs).Create("%SuperServer", .p) kill p
set p("SSLSuperServer")=1 set sc = ##class(Security.System).Modify("SYSTEM", .p) kill p
return 1
